dao.name: QRY_RATECOD_MN_DG
dao.statement: SELECT RATE_COD,RATECOD_NAM,MENU_NAM,RATE_PROP,RATE_GRP,SOURCE_TYP,GUEST_TYP, REMARK1, hotel_cod, athena_id FROM RATECOD_MN WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND trim(HOTEL_COD) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_RATECOD_MN
dao.statement: select * from ratecod_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and rate_cod = :rate_cod

dao.name: CHK_BASERATE_FLAG
dao.statement: select count(*) as chk_num from ratecod_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and baserate_flag = 'DP' and baserate_cod = :rate_cod and use_sta = 'Y'

dao.name: QRY_CONTRACT_DT_RATE_COD
dao.statement: SELECT DISTINCT RATECOD_MN.RATE_COD as value, RATECOD_MN.RATE_COD ||':'|| RATECOD_MN.RATECOD_NAM as display FROM RATESUPPLY_DT, RATECOD_MN WHERE RATECOD_MN.ATHENA_ID = RATESUPPLY_DT.ATHENA_ID AND to_date(:begin_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') <= RATESUPPLY_DT.END_DAT AND to_date(:end_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') >= RATESUPPLY_DT.BEGIN_DAT AND RATECOD_MN.USE_STA = 'Y' AND RATECOD_MN.CONTRACT_USE = 'Y' AND RATECOD_MN.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND trim(RATECOD_MN.HOTEL_COD) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_CONTRACT_DT_ALL_RATE_COD
dao.statement: SELECT DISTINCT RATECOD_MN.RATE_COD as value, RATECOD_MN.RATECOD_NAM as display FROM RATESUPPLY_DT, RATECOD_MN WHERE RATECOD_MN.ATHENA_ID = RATESUPPLY_DT.ATHENA_ID AND RATECOD_MN.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id

dao.name: QRY_CONTRACT_EXIST
dao.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) as order_rate_Count FROM RATESUPPLY_DT, RATECOD_MN WHERE RATECOD_MN.ATHENA_ID = RATESUPPLY_DT.ATHENA_ID AND RATECOD_MN.HOTEL_COD = RATESUPPLY_DT.HOTEL_COD AND RATECOD_MN.RATE_COD = RATESUPPLY_DT.RATE_COD AND to_date(:begin_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') <= RATESUPPLY_DT.END_DAT AND to_date(:end_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') >= RATESUPPLY_DT.BEGIN_DAT AND RATECOD_MN.USE_STA = 'Y' AND RATECOD_MN.CONTRACT_USE = 'Y' AND RATECOD_MN.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND trim(RATECOD_MN.HOTEL_COD) = trim(:hotel_cod) AND RATECOD_MN.RATE_COD = trim(:rate_cod)

dao.name: QRY_RATE_NAM
dao.statement: SELECT RATECOD_NAM FROM RATECOD_MN WHERE trim(rate_cod) = trim(:rate_cod)

dao.name: SEL_RATECOD_MN
dao.statement: SELECT DISTINCT RATE_COD value, RATECOD_NAM display FROM RATECOD_MN WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id and hotel_cod = :hotel_cod ORDER BY RATE_COD

dao.name: QRY_RATEGRP_IS_EXIST
dao.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) as rate_grp_count FROM RATECOD_MN WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND hotel_cod = :hotel_cod AND RATE_GRP = :rate_grp AND ROWNUM <= 1
